type.description: uint, parsed as hex (with or without 0x prefix)
type.name: uintHex

type.description: Map of strings to strings, in JSON object format.
type.name: stringToStringMap

type.description: An object containing an id, label, and description.
type.name: com.silabs.ss.platform.api.descriptor.core.model.MDescribable

type.description: An object containing an id, label, and description, and (key, value) properties.
type.name: com.silabs.ss.platform.api.descriptor.core.model.MDescriptor

type.description: An object containing the set of hardware
type.name: hardwareContext

type.description: A string of multiple compatibility strings and their engines
type.name: compatibility

propertyGroup.description: Properties related to Registry support for Descriptors
propertyGroup.label: Registry Properties
propertyGroup.name: registry

property.description: The detector that provided this descriptor
property.name: providingDetector

property.description: Version for an object, in OSGi Version syntax
property.name: version

property.description: Category of a module, as a human-readable string
property.name: category

property.description: A boolean indicating if the category has been generated
property.name: generatedCategory

property.description: List of strings used in UI categorize, or group, documents
property.name: categories

property.description: Importance, as a human-readable string
property.name: priority

property.description: List of strings matched when searching for an item (after its name, label, and description)
property.name: keywords

property.description: URI to visit for a "More info..." link
property.label: "More info" URI
property.name: moreInfoUri

property.description: See CoreProperties#PART_COMPATIBILITY
property.label: Part Compatibility Grammar
property.name: partCompatibility

property.description: See CoreProperties#BOARD_COMPATIBILITY
property.label: Board Compatibility Grammar
property.name: boardCompatibility

property.description: See CoreProperties#KIT_COMPATIBILITY
property.label: Kit Compatibility Grammar
property.name: kitCompatibility

property.description: See CoreProperties#SDK_COMPATIBILITY
property.label: SDK Compatibility Grammar
property.name: sdkCompatibility

property.description: See CoreProperties#PROTOCOL_COMPATIBILITY
property.label: Protocol Compatibility Grammar
property.name: protocolCompatibility

property.description: Tell whether the descriptor/entity is hidden from UI.
property.name: hidden

property.description: URI to an installed or detected entity
property.name: installationPath

property.description: Tell whether the entity is auto-enabled for the descriptor.
property.label: Auto-enable
property.name: autoEnable

property.description: Tell whether the entity is preferred, for example, when selecting a default.
property.name: preferred

property.description: Flag indicating that a given descriptor/entity has been auto-detected by Studio vs. being manually added by a user
property.name: builtin

property.description: Flag indicating a given descriptor/entity is detected vs. being manually added.
property.name: detected

property.description: Flag indicating a given descriptor/entity should always be enabled (like the None SDK).
property.name: alwaysEnabled

property.description: Flag indicating whether an entity is bundled or not
property.name: bundled

property.description: Stored error message from when the descriptor was last scanned
property.name: scannedErrorMessage

property.description: The path to a file that contains the description for this object.
property.name: descriptionFile

property.description: The title of this descriptor
property.name: title

property.description: A string compatibility with each engine
property.name: compatibility

property.description: The last edited time stamp for the installation path
property.name: timeStamp

property.description: The date this document was last modified
property.name: lastModified

property.description: The author of the last modification
property.name: lastModifiedBy

property.description: The date this document was last revised
property.name: lastRevised

property.description: The date this document was last replicated
property.name: lastReplication

property.description: The author of the last replication
property.name: lastReplicatedBy

property.description: The action of the last replication
property.name: lastReplicationAction

property.description: The tags placed by AEM
property.name: tags

property.description: The sdk and protocol tags placed by AEM
property.name: sdkAndProtocolTags

property.description: The studio tags placed by AEM
property.name: studioTags

property.description: The kit tags placed by AEM
property.name: kitTags

property.description: The location of example code associated with the Application Note if applicable
property.name: exampleURI

property.description: The language in which the document is written
property.name: language

property.description: The content type of the document
property.name: contentType

property.description: The document description
property.name: description

property.description: The quality for this entity
property.name: quality

property.description: The provider label for this entity
property.name: providerLabel

property.description: List of Readme Files for this entity
property.name: readmeFiles

property.description: The provider uri for this entity
property.name: providerUri

property.description: The path to the metadata xml file.
property.name: metadataFile

property.description: Whether the property is read-only. If true, attempts to write it will result in an UnsupportedOperationException.
property.name: readOnly

property.description: Allowed literal values for the property.
property.name: enumValues

property.description: Human-readable labels for the property. This list is parallel to the {@link #ENUM_VALUES} property (the label is indexed by the same value as for a given enum value). If the list is shorter than the enum index, the default label is the enum value.
property.name: enumLabels

propertyGroup.description: Properties specific to hardware within Simplicity Studios Hardware Database
propertyGroup.name: hardware

property.description: General name of this hardware. Different implementors may have different ways of defining name.
property.name: name

property.description: Revision information for a hardware descriptor. Note that revision is not always different from version.
property.name: rev

property.description: the hardware type or namespace for this hardware descriptor
property.name: hardwareNamespace

propertyGroup.description: Properties specific to trusting signatures within Simplicity Studio
propertyGroup.name: signature_trust

property.description: Flag indicating a given descriptor/entity must be trusted to be added.
property.name: requiresTrust

property.description: Flag indicating a given descriptor/entity is a trusted content.
property.name: trusted

property.description: Flag indicating a given descriptor/entity is signed.
property.name: isSigned

property.description: String description for the trust state of the descriptor.
property.name: trustDescription
